title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form P-13 - Affidavit of comparison
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form P-13 - Affidavit of comparison

State Regulations

Form P-13
(Affidavit of Comparison)
(Note: Attach a copy of the Will/Codicil
to this Affidavit of Comparison executed by any two persons; if a photocopy of
the Will is used, only one person need make the affidavit.)
SURROGATE'S COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF
________X
PROBATE PROCEEDING, Will of AFFIDAVIT OF COMPARISON
a/k/a

Deceased. File No. ________
________X
STATE OF NEW YORK)
) ss.: COUNTY OF)
I/We ________ (and) ____________
being duly sworn, say(s), that (he/she
has) (we have) carefully compared the copy of decedent's Will/Codicil
propounded herein to which this affidavit is annexed with the original Will
dated the ________ day of ____________, 19 ________, (and the original Codicil
dated the ________ day of ____________, 19 ________), about to be filed for probate, and that
the same is in all respects a true and correct copy of said original

Will/Codicil and of the whole thereof. ________
Signature

Sworn to before me this ________
________
day of ________, 19 ________ Print

Name
________
Signature
________
Print Name
________
Notary Public

Commission Expires: (Affix Notary Stamp or Seal)
P-13 (9/96)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form
P-13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
